title: President condoles with families of North Waziristan martyrs
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 22 (APP):President Dr Arif Alvi on Monday offered condolence to the families of Captain Sabih Abrar and Sepoy Naveed Akhtar, who were martyred yesterday in North Waziristan.
The President phoned the family members of the martyrs and prayed for the departed souls to rest in peace.
He prayed to Allah Almighty to grant the martyrs highest place in heavens and give patience to their families.
Captain Sabih Abrar and Sepoy Naveed Akhtar had embraced martyrdom in an exchange of fire with terrorists in North Waziristan on Sunday.
